divs: Sighting DetailsI WAS PARKED IN A PARKING TAKING MY LUNCH BREAK FROM WORK IN A PARKING LOT OVER LOOKING THE LIVERMORE PLEASANTON VALLEY AND OVER LOOKING AN AIRPORT.THE OBJECT WAS ABOUT 15 MILES AWAY BUT WAS A CLEAR DAY AND NO FLYING OBJECTS SEEN IN THAT AREA.IVE NEVER SEEN A UFO IN MY LIFE,, AND THAT WAS NOT AN AIRPLANE BECAUSE UT WAS FLYING BELOW THE HILLSIDES AND NOT A HELICOPTER BECAUSE IT WAS AS SILVER THAT IT CAN BE SEEN FOR MILES THEN IT LIKE DISAPEARD BEFORE MY EYES FOR A SECOND THEN CAME BACK.THE FLIGHT PATH AS i LOOKED IT UP IN LOCAL MAPS FOLLOWS A NUCLEAR GE PLANT THAT HAD A RADIATION LEAKAGE ABOUT IN THE 70TIES.I LOST SIGHT OF THE OBJECT AS IT WENTBEHIND A HILL , AND NEVER CAM OUT OF THE AT THE OTHER END OF IT. I SAW SILVER OBJECT LOOKING LIKE A BELL SHAPE FLYING EAST TO WEST ABOUT 2-3 MILES PER HOUR ABOUT 20 FEET OFF THE GROUND BETWEEN HILLS SOUTH OF LIVERMORE CALIF AND FLYING TOWARDS A GE NUCLEAR SITE.IT WAS DUSK AND IT AT TIMES APPEARED TO DISAPPEAR AND REAPPEAR.WHEN LOOKING FOR IT WHEN IT FLEW TO THE OTHER SIDE THE HILL ,, IT DID NOT COME OUT.NO PICTURES WERE TAKEN BUT IT LOOKS LIKE PICTURES TAKEN BUT OTHERS IN WHICH AN OBJECT IS FLYING BETWEEN HILLS.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Livermore

Summary: SILVER IN COLOR, SIZE ABOUT 6FT HIGHT BELL SHAPED
